title: Dreamwalker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give someone a nightmare each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you give someone a nightmare, you may choose up to two other players for them to be scared of.

- Your target will be scared away if they attempt to visit a player they are scared of.

- You cannot give a fellow Mafia member a nightmare. If this would happen for any reason, your ability will fail. You will be notified if this happens.

- You cannot make someone have a nightmare about themselves or yourself.

- You will be notified when a player with a nightmare is scared away from a player they are a scared of.

- You cannot give someone more than one nightmare. If you do, the previously given nightmare will be erased.

- If you die, your targets will no longer have their nightmares.
